title: Patching Problem
body:
there is a problem in the update, I'm trying to patch it and it says there is a problem with the servers and its's preventing me from patching.
I checked the site and the status of the EU nordic & east and it says everything is normal.
My connection is great, I have no problem.

replies.body: Forget it it started, I have no idea why XD
Huh....strange. It might have been some odd hiccup with your connection, but I'm glad you finally got through!
I am currently having the same problem.
